entry.data:
MOSTLY CLEAR
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS THIS EVENING, THEN A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SPRINKLES AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST 10 TO 15 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT
GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 40
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 50
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 40
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 20
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
LOWS IN THE MID 20S

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
